installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
echo "[*] Starting setup..."
cd /mnt/server

# Clone de repo
if [ ! -d "icecast-autodj" ]; then
    echo "[*] Cloning repository..."
    git clone https://github.com/finnie2006/icecast-autodj.git
else
    echo "[*] Repository already present."
fi

# Kopieer alleen de config-bestanden
echo "[*] Copying liquidsoap and icecast configs..."
cp icecast-autodj/configs/radio.liq /mnt/server/radio.liq
cp icecast-autodj/configs/icecast.xml /mnt/server/icecast.xml

# Maak de data directories
echo "[*] Creating data directories..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/music
mkdir -p /mnt/server/log

# Ruim de repo op
echo "[*] Cleaning up cloned repo..."
rm -rf /mnt/server/icecast-autodj

echo "[*] Setup complete! 🎉"
